{{also|歸納|归纳}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|き|のう|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
* [[音読み|On'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[kʲino̞ː]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きのう|hhira=きなふ|kyu=歸納}}

# [[induction]]: [[deriving]] information from a set of observations
# when choosing a name, a form of [[fortune-telling]] for a given name based on kanji with similar sounds
# [[collecting]], [[gathering]]

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|帰納学派|きのう がくは}}: an [[inductive]] [[school of thought]]
* {{ja-r|帰納式|きのうしき}}: a [[recursion]] [[formula]], a [[recursion]] [[relation]]
* {{ja-r|帰納的|きのうてき}}: [[inductive]]
* {{ja-r|帰納的推理|きのうてき すいり}}: [[inductive]] [[reasoning]]
* {{ja-r|帰納法|きのうほう}}: the [[inductive]] [[method]]
* {{ja-r|帰納論理学|きのう ろんりがく}}: [[inductive]] [[logic]]

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|演繹|えんえき}}: [[deduction]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|きのう|hhira=きなふ}}

# to [[induce]]: to [[derive]] information from a set of observations
# when choosing a name, to tell the fortune for a given name based on kanji with similar sounds
# to [[collect]], to [[gather]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|きのう}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to collect or gather}} {{ja-r|寄せ集める|よせあつめる}}

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|演繹する|linkto=演繹|えんえき する}}: to [[deduce]]
